quote.ambassador_quote: I’m proud to be part of Buddy Bites — a dog food brand that gives 1kg to shelters for every 2kg sold, helping dogs feel truly seen and loved.
quote.ambassador_subtitle: Lin Min Chen - Singer, actress, obsessed with dogs.

faqs.heading: Why I joined the buddy bites family?
faqs.q1: Why did you decide to partner with Buddy Bites?
faqs.a1: "I’ve always had a deep love for dogs, and being able to give back to them in a meaningful way has been something close to my heart. That’s why I’m so grateful for the chance to partner with Buddy Bites — a brand that not only offers high-quality, nutritious food, but also puts compassion at the center of everything they do. For every 2kg of food sold, 1kg is donated to shelters in need. That kind of generosity truly moved me. It’s not just about feeding dogs — it’s about giving them a better life. I’m so proud to be part of a mission that’s helping dogs feel seen, cared for, and loved."
faqs.q2: What do you love most about Buddy Bites products?
faqs.a2: "「Honestly? It’s like giving a belly rub to dogs you’ve never even met! I love that Buddy Bites makes doing good feel so simple — you buy a bag of yummy, high-quality food, and just like that, a shelter dog gets a full bowl too. The kibble itself is top-notch (vet-approved and made with ingredients I can actually pronounce!), but it’s the mission that makes it extra special. It feels like being part of a little secret dog-loving club that’s doing big things"
faqs.q3: Tell us about your own dog(s)!
faqs.a3: "I currently have a dog named Blue. I named her Blue because of her beautiful blue eyes; I called her that the first time I met her. Our family has shared ten wonderful years with Blue. She is a particularly gentle and adorable little companion. Every time she sits down, her paws are always crossed, and she loves to smile at us. She is our very best friend! Watching her thrive reminds me how much joy and comfort dogs bring into our lives — they deserve the very best care in return."
faqs.q4: Why do you think Buddy Bites stands out?
faqs.a4: "Buddy Bites stands out because it's a brand with both heart and science behind it. It’s rare to find a company that prioritizes nutritional excellence while also committing so strongly to social good. Their support of over 15 shelters in Hong Kong and Singapore, providing consistent and nutritious food for rescue dogs, really sets them apart. It’s not just about selling dog food — it’s about building a better future for all dogs."
faqs.q5: What values do you share with Buddy Bites?
faqs.a5: "We both believe that every dog, no matter where they are — in a loving home or in a shelter — deserves consistent, healthy food and proper care. I also resonate deeply with the idea of using everyday choices to create meaningful impact. Choosing a dog food brand like Buddy Bites means you’re not only nourishing your own dog, but also helping to ease the burden on shelters and give more dogs a better chance at life."
faqs.q6: What message would you like to share with other pet parents?
faqs.a6: "To all the pet parents out there: feeding your dog with love can now also mean feeding another dog in need. By choosing Buddy Bites, you’re making a positive difference every day — and your dog gets to enjoy top-quality meals made with care. It’s a simple switch with a powerful ripple effect. I’m proud to be part of this journey with Buddy Bites, and I hope you’ll join us in spreading kindness, one bowl at a time."

donations.slogan: For every 2kg you buy, Buddy Bites donates 1kg to shelters

cta_section.subheader: Get your pup premium dog food and donate to shelters in the process!

our_story.title: Our Story
our_story.description: We know what you are thinking, 'why did these people start a dog food brand', and as importantly, 'why am I reading about it.' The first part is simple. We knew first hand the challenge of getting truly good quality dog food, consistently. We also knew the challenges that dog shelters go through. So, we created Buddy Bites to fix both these issues...To ensure Nacho and Nala (Chris' dogs) could eat food their guts deserve, whilst feeding their friends in shelters with every order. As to why you are reading it, we are not sure, but we certainly hope it's because you have a dog, and even more so that you're going to join the many pups moving to Buddy Bites!

point1.title: Giving Back
point1.description: Giving back to our dog community is at the center of our business. Our goal is to provide premium kibble for all dogs in shelters across Asia!

point2.title: Best Pup Health
point2.description: Your Pet’s health is our priority. We ensure quality of our product with constant testing and partner closely with our vets to bring the best food for our dogs.

point3.title: Happy Customers
point3.description: We aim to make feeding your pup as enjoyable as it should be! Given you are not eating the food yourself, it's only fair the customer service is superb.

section_only_the_good_stuff.title: Only The Good Stuff
section_only_the_good_stuff.subtext: MAKING SURE OUR FOOD IS NO.1
section_only_the_good_stuff.description_1: We partner closely with certified pet nutritionists, as well as Hong Kong based vets to formulate nutritious recipes packed with only the ingredients your pup needs.
section_only_the_good_stuff.description_2: All our recipes are made in Europe with premium ingredients, and tested beyond AAFCO standards.
section_only_the_good_stuff.description_3: It's amazing how much of our job involves talking about poo. We include gut-friendly prebiotics in all our recipes to make sure your dogs gut gets looked after. Consistent poos starts with consistent dog food.

section_sustainability.title: Sustainability
section_sustainability.subtext: Buddy Bites is committed to sustainability to ensure a bright future for our people, pets, and planet.

faqs.title: FAQs
faqs.subtext: We gathered the most asked questions but we can't cover them all here, so if you can't find what you're looking for

question1.title: What is Buddy Bites?
question1.answer: Buddy Bites is a premium pet food brand that supports sheltered dogs by donating 1kg of food for every 2kg we sell. We provide vet-backed, AAFCO regulated dry food and treats for all breeds, ages and sizes that delivers straight to your door.

question2.title: Why should my dog eat Buddy Bites?
question2.answer: Our recipes are backed by vets, regulated by AAFCO and designed to provide everything your dog needs, no matter their breed or age….plus suited to the fussiest of eaters!

question3.title: Where is Buddy Bites based?
question3.answer: Buddy Bites operates in Hong Kong and Singapore. Let us know where you would like to see Buddy Bites next!

question4.title: Is everything vet tested?
question4.answer: Yes, we have certified and established vets in Buddy Bites that oversee the testing of all our recipes via a third party testing facility.

question5.title: Can I find Buddy Bites in store?
question5.answer1: Yes! You can find Buddy Bites products at stores across Hong Kong. Find the nearest stockist to you.
question5.link: Find the nearest stockist to you
question5.answer2: If you are interested in stocking Buddy Bites, drop us a message:

question6.title: Does Buddy Bites have a referral program?
question6.answer: Refer your friend and both enjoy a $150 discount on your next order.

question7.title: How can I contact Buddy Bites for help?
question7.answer: You can contact Buddy Bites via email at

question8.title: How much does Buddy Bites donate?
question8.answer: Buddy Bites donate 1kg of kibble for every 2kg we sell. These donations go to our shelter partners in both HK and Singapore!

question9.title: What shelters does Buddy Bites donate to?
question9.answer: We currently pawtner with 8 shelters in Hong Kong and Singapore: Catherine's Puppies, HKDR, SKSF, SOSD, PGRS, Love Fluffy Home, Tails Lantau, and HKSCDA. We continue to help with more shelters and foster families!

question1.title: Where is Buddy Bites made?
question1.answer: All Buddy Bites Kibble is made in Europe and regulated to AAFCO standards. You might have even seen the video of Ryan eating our food. We didn't ask him to do it, but it's safe to do so and he's a bit weird.

question2.title: What is the shelf life of the kibble?
question2.answer: The shelf life of Buddy Bites is around 18 months, with the use by date printed on the back of the packaging.

question3.title: What is AAFCO?
question3.answer: The Association of American Feed Control Officials set the global standards for quality pet food. They are a regulatory body based in the U.S. and we make sure to stay in their good books!

question4.title: How is your product tested?
question4.answer: Buddy Bites is tested straight after production and then again following arrival in Asia by a third party lab. We work alongside our vets to test for all recent recall issues to make sure we are providing the safest pet food we can offer. We test for Salmonella & E. Coli bacteria, Mycotoxins (Ochratoxin & Aflatoxins), Melamine and its metabolites, and excess vitamin D2 & D3 for peace of mind.

question5.title: What food is good for a small dog?
question5.answer: For smaller breeds, we recommed the
question5.answer2: as it is the smallest kibble size we offer for adults (10mm diameter).

question6.title: How do I know how much to order for my dog?
question6.answer: Take a look at our feeding guidelines per recipe and check our daily recommended feeding guideline (grams per day) corresponding to your dog's weight. Adjust as needed if your dog is on the skinnier or chunkier side.

question7.title: Is Buddy Bites grain free?
question7.answer: No, we include grains in all of our recipes. 'Good' grains are carbohydrates which are an important part of a dog's diet, as they are omnivores. There are ongoing investigations into the links between grain-free recipes and DCM (dilated cardiomyopathy). Whilst the investigations are not concluded, we prefer to avoid grain-free for now.

question8.title: How much does the Buddy Bites scoop hold?
question8.answer: Each Buddy Bites scoop holds around 110 grams.

question9.title: What is the kibble size?
question9.answer: Our kibble sizes range from 10-14mm to suit dogs of all breeds, ages and sizes. Our smaller kibble is suitable for smaller breeds and older dogs with less teeth who still enjoy eating kibble. Our larger kibble is suitable for large dog breeds and dogs who need more encouragement to chew to aid digestion. The kibble size of each recipe can be found on each product page on our website.

question10.title: What is a novel protein?
question10.answer: Novel proteins are proteins that have appeared in dog's diets less over the years and are therefore less likely to trigger allergies. We use novel proteins in our Adult recipes.

question1.title: What are the benefits of subscribing?
question1.answer: Convenience and cash!! By subscribing you receive a 15% discount to standard pricing, and the convenience of not having to go back into the website to order every month. It just arrives at your door as if by magic. On top of that we throw some extra goodies in your orders, first one guaranteed!

question2.title: Is the subscription flexible?
question2.answer: Absolutely! Our subscriptions are purely for convenience, they are completely flexible. You can pause, edit or cancel any time. You can change flavour, delivery date, frequency all in just a few clicks via your customer portal. Plus you will have dedicated support via
question2.answer2: if you have any questions or need anything changed. There is no charge for subscribing, just order your food, and let us deliver to your door on repeat at no extra cost.

question3.title: How can I use the dedicated support?
question3.answer: Buddy Bites subscription support team is here for you via
question3.answer2: to help with any and all things Buddy Bites. E.g. Swap products, change order frequency, change address... We can help with all of the above and more and we welcome any photos of your dog!

question4.title: What kind of payment is accepted?
question4.answer: We accept all major credit cards, Alipay, WeChat Pay and Paypal that can accept recurring payments.

question5.title: When do deliveries come?
question5.answer: Your order should arrive 2-3 working days from payment (unless you've paid for same day delivery). We delivery Monday to Saturday. Your order will include a tracking number and you will get a message from your delivery driver prior to the arrival of your food in case you are not in.

question6.title: Can I change flavour?
question6.answer: You sure can! When you subscribe you will get an email helping you to set up an account. From there you can change your flavour, or anything else including recurring dates, amount, and more. If you have any trouble
question6.answer2: us with any questions. We will respond quick as a greyhound.

question7.title: Can I change delivery date?
question7.answer: Absolutely! When you subscribe you will get an email helping you to set up an account. From there you can change the delivery date, or anything else. If you have any trouble

question8.title: Can I change frequency?
question8.answer: Absolutely! Have a look at the feeding guidelines before you order, however not everyone get's it right first time. So you can log into your account and customize your order from there. If you have any trouble

question1.title: When will I receive my order?
question1.answer: Free standard shipping takes 2-3 days, including outlying islands. We also offer same-day delivery for an added fee to addresses in Hong Kong island, Kowloon, and some parts of New Territories.

question3.title: How much does delivery cost?
question3.answer: We offer free standard delivery for orders over $250. Orders under $250 will be charged $60 shipping fee for standard delivery, including outlying islands. Same-day delivery orders of over $250 have an added shipping fee of $60, and for orders under $250 a $90 fee.

question4.title: Do you offer same day delivery?
question4.answer: Yes! We offer same-day delivery to addresses in Hong Kong island, Kowloon and some parts of the New Territories. The fee depends on your total order amount.

question5.title: Who does your deliveries?
question5.answer: We partner with external logistics partners Kerry and SF Express to deliver your order straight to your door.

question6.title: Where do you ship to?
question6.answer: We are available in Hong Kong and Singapore. If you would like Buddy Bites to open up in your city next, let us know!

question7.title: Any extra charge for outlying islands?
question7.answer: No! We aim to make delivering dog food as easy and convenient as possible to all dogs, which is why we offer free standard delivery to the whole of Hong Kong for orders over $250.

question8.title: Will I be notified of my deliveries?
question8.answer: Yes! You will receive an Order Confirmation email with a tracking number from our logistics partner to check your order in real time. Our logistics partner will also send you a message on the day of your delivery.

question9.title: What happens if my parcel is damaged?
question9.answer: Get in touch with us at

question1.title: What payment options do you have?
question1.answer: We accept PayPal, Google Pay, Alipay, and all major credit cards for one-time and subscription orders. You can choose to pay by WeChat Pay, FPS, and UnionPay for one-time orders.

question2.title: How do I change my card details?
question2.answer2: to help you navigate the customer portal with your Buddy Bites login. Don't have an account setup? You'll find the link in your 'Order Confirmation email' from your 1st order. Still having trouble? Contact us via
question2.answer3: — we'll send you a new activation link.

question3.title: Is there a charge for subscription?
question3.answer: Subscribing to Buddy Bites is free! Better than that, you save 15% on EVERY ORDER by subscribing!

question4.title: How does subscription payment work?
question4.answer: Your recurring orders will be charged to the same payment method you used to complete your previous Buddy Bites order. You can change your payment details anytime on your Buddy Bites account via our customer portal. Watch this
question4.answer2: to see how. You will be notified via email 3 days before your orders are due to renew to give you time to make any changes — pause, skip, swap, change the amount of kibble, add products to your upcoming order.

question5.title: How do I apply discount codes?
question5.answer: Discount codes can be applied at checkout on the right-hand side bar.

question6.title: Can I apply codes to my subscriptions?
question6.answer: Yes, if you have a useable code. Just login and on the 'manage subscriptions' page there is an option to enter in a discount code on the bottom left. This is where you should apply your discount code from our referral program!

question7.title: How long do refunds take to process?
question7.answer: You should get a notification immediately and it can take up to 12 working days, but usually between 3-5 depending on the associated bank.

question8.title: What happens if my card has an error?
question8.answer: You can update your payment details securely via your Buddy Bites account on our customer portal. Watch our
question8.answer2: to see how. Don't have an account setup? You'll find the link in your Order Confirmation email from your 1st order. Still having trouble? Contact us via
question8.answer3: — we'll send you a new activation link.

question9.title: Why isn't my discount code working?
question9.answer: Some discount codes are specific to first time orders, or specific emails. If you have any issues, just drop us an

store_locator.subtext: Locate a store near you that carries Buddy Bites or subscribe online to never run out!

subscription.title: Food for life
subscription.subtext: Never worry, never run out, never think about kibble when you subscribe to BUDDY BITES

steps.title: Customise. Subscribe. Receive.
steps.step2: Tell us where and when to deliver

look_after_your_gut.title: Look after your dog's gut
look_after_your_gut.subtext: Our recipes contain prebiotics to treat your dog's digestion right

reviews.title: See what others are barking about Buddy Bites

review1.title: Best product on the market and number one for service!
review1.subtext: Buddy bites was great with my senior dog and so it is no surprise that the puppy food is a hit with our new addition. The convenience of the subscription and the immaculate service and communication make Buddy Bites a must for pet owners with busy lives.
review1.product: Luna enjoys 5kg of our puppy recipe delivered every 4 weeks

review2.title: Poppy loves the duck flavor of her new Buddy Bites
review2.subtext: Love the subscription. Now I don't have to panic last minute when I realize we're almost out of food. Poppy loves the food and it's nice to know we are helping local dog charities.
review2.product: Poppy enjoys 5kg of our puppy recipe delivered every 6 weeks

review3.title: Very easy to change subscription!
review3.subtext: Having 2 pups on Buddy Bites now we were unsure of how much food and how often we our wanted our delivery but managing your subscription on the Buddy Bites website is super easy! We realised we were running out of food and found it very easy to change both the delivery date and the amount of food we needed!
review3.product: Prince and Noble enjoys 7kg of our puppy recipe delivered every 4 weeks

hero_section.subtext: European ingredients, real flavour, real impact

featured_products.title: Fussy pup? we’ve got you covered
featured_products.subtext: We’ve worked with nutritionists and vets to come up with a variety of recipes to suit dogs all shapes and sizes. Plus, we include prebiotics to make sure your dog’s gut gets treated right.

section_good_stuff.title: Only The Good Stuff
section_good_stuff.subtext: Buddy Bites started with the goal of feeding all sheltered dogs in Asia. We are the first subscription based food brand that gives back - we donate 1kg for every 2kg bought. Our dog food formula is backed by vets, plus with a subscription you never need to worry about buying dog food again.

point1.title: Vet-backed formula
point1.subtext: Our expertly crafted formulas are backed by veterinarians, ensuring that your beloved furry friend is receiving only the best.

point2.title: Gut-friendly Prebiotics
point2.subtext: We take gut health seriously, which is why our dog food is packed with prebiotics that will keep your pup's digestion running smoothly.

point3.title: Made in Europe
point3.subtext: All our dog food is made in Europe, using the highest quality ingredients. We're proud to support local businesses and ensure that our products are made with care.

point4.title: Premium, Traceable Ingredients
point4.subtext: We source our ingredients from trusted suppliers, ensuring that every ingredient is of the highest quality. We're proud to support local businesses and ensure that our products are made with care.

section_our_buddies_love_a_bite.title: Our Buddies Love A Bite
section_our_buddies_love_a_bite.subtext: From dedicated subscribers to first time buyers - hear what people have to say about Buddy Bites.

review1.title: Marie C.M.
review1.subtext: First class service! Communication is wonderful with the use of whatsapp and emails are replied to swiftly. My dog absolutely loves the food and with the easy subscription it makes running out of dog food a thing of the past!

review2.title: Lynn L.
review2.subtext: As a pet owner, I've tried numerous brands and flavors but nothing seemed to do the trick for my fussy dog until I discovered Buddy Bites. Love the fast delivery, packaging and the gift. Thanks for the WOW services!!

review3.title: Namratha S.
review3.subtext: I just wanted to express my utmost satisfaction with the purchase of Buddy Bites for my beloved goldy boy. He eagerly awaits his meals. Thank you for going above and beyond in delivering a high-quality product.

review4.title: Steffi c.
review4.subtext: Great product, my soon 2 years old boy Chico has only eaten kibble from Buddy Bites he loves it so much, also I like their concept - for every 2kg delivered, Buddy Bites donates 1kg to dog shelters in need ❤

review5.title: Victor A.
review5.subtext: We have an ongoing treat subscription with buddy bites because our dogs are really fussy! Lucky for us, buddy bites is super reactive and has one of the best customer service ever. We’re very lucky to have them in Hong Kong

review6.title: Stephanie p.
review6.subtext: Love Buddy Bites! I love how I can alter how much I need when it gets delivered so if I need it pushed back by a week or if I need it earlier I can easily make the adjustment. Gives me full flexibility to make sure my pup never goes hungry.

review7.title: Nelss L.
review7.subtext: My Love is a picky eater. She never finished her kibbles and always tooks hours to try to finish. Today is the 3rd meals we gave Buddy Bites to her and she finish them within minutes! We will be placing another order for sure!

review8.title: Jamie T.
review8.subtext: My dog has been refusing to eat her usual kibbles so I decided to try Buddy Bites and she loves it! I also liked that the bag had a velcro seal as you can seal it easily with 2 fingers. Thanks for the additional foldable bowl and the tote bag, really useful!

section_giving_back.title: Giving back to the community
section_giving_back.subtext: For every 2kg of dog food purchased, we donate 1kg to local shelters!

question1.answer: All Buddy Bites Kibble is made in Europe and regulated to AAFCO standards. You might have even seen the video of Ryan eating our food. We didn't ask him to do it, but it's safe to do so and he's a bit weird.

question2.title: How do I know how much to order for my dog?
question2.answer: Take a look at our feeding guidelines per recipe and check our daily recommended feeding guideline (grams per day) corresponding to your dog's weight. Adjust as needed if your dog is on the skinnier or chunkier side.

question3.title: Is Buddy Bites good for sensitive tummys?
question3.answer: Our Adult recipes are formulated with novel and premium proteins to suit allergy-prone dogs with probiotics, helping digestion and ensuring good poop.

question4.title: What is the kibble size?
question4.answer: Our kibble sizes range from 10-14mm to suit dogs of all breeds, ages and sizes. Our smaller kibble is suitable for smaller breeds and older dogs with less teeth who still enjoy eating kibble. Our larger kibble is suitable for large dog breeds and dogs who need more encouragement to chew to aid digestion. The kibble size of each recipe can be found on each product page on our website.

question5.title: What are the benefits of subscribing?
question5.answer: Convenience and cash!! By subscribing you receive a 15% discount to standard pricing, and the convenience of not having to go back into the website to order every month. It just arrives at your door as if by magic. On top of that we throw some extra goodies in your orders, first one guaranteed!

question6.title: Is the subscription flexible?
question6.answer: Absolutely! Our subscriptions are purely for convenience, they are completely flexible. You can pause, edit or cancel any time. You can change flavour, delivery date, frequency all in just a few clicks via your customer portal. Plus you will have dedicated support via Whatsapp if you have any questions or need anything changed. There is no charge for subscribing, just order your food, and let us deliver to your door on repeat at no extra cost.

question7.title: How can I edit my subscription?
question7.answer1: You can pause, edit or cancel any time. You can change flavour, delivery date, frequency all in just a few clicks via your customer portal. Easy peasy, from when you log in, but
question7.answer2: should give you some useful insights.

question8.title: Can I try a sample first?
question8.answer2: available for each recipe. These sample bags are 500g, plenty for your pup to try a few meals and to be sure they like it!

section_newsletter.title: Buddy Bites Newsletter
section_newsletter.description: Sign up to newsletter to hear about upcoming recipes and offers.

office_address.title: Office Address:
office_address.address: Hua Fu Commercial Building, Queen’s Road West

product.one_sampler_limit: You can only order 1 Starter Pack

nutrition.title: Nutrition
nutrition.subtext: Our nutritionists and vets worked hard to come up with picky-eater-proof recipes, packed with highly digestible nutrients.

toppers.line_1: Our toppers are intended for intermittent or supplemental feeding.
toppers.line_2: The Caloric intake should not exceed 10% of your pups total daily requirement.
toppers.line_3: Just add them to a delicious bowl of kibble and watch them lick it clean.

treats.header: How much can my buddy have?
treats.subtext: Treats are for occasional feeding and are not meant to replace a balanced diet. Treats should not make up more than 10% of your dog's daily diet.
treats.dental_subtext: Dental Sticks are not suitable for puppies. Adult dogs should not consume more than one per day
treats.treat_size_subtext: Medium sized: These meaty treats are chunky, but easy to break into smaller pieces. Suitable for Great Danes all the way to Pom's.

shipping.title: Shipping
shipping.answer: Standard shipping takes 2-3 working days and is FREE on orders over $250. Same day shipping must be ordered before 12pm and cost $60. No deliveries on Sundays and Public Holidays.

flexible_subscription.title: Flexible Subscription
flexible_subscription.answer: Your subscription is completely flexible - you can edit, pause or cancel your recurring order at any time, at no extra cost. Simply log in to your account or contact our team, who will be happy to help.

giving_back.title: Giving Back
giving_back.answer: On all kibble orders, for every 2kg we sell, we donate 1kg to shelters.We've now donated over 1 million meals all thanks to you!

toppers_no_kibbles.title: Can I give this to my dog with no kibble?
toppers_no_kibbles.answer: Absolutely! They’re wholesome enough to serve on their own, but they don’t have the full vitamin and nutrient stack of kibble — so think of them as a tasty treat, not a total diet.

toppers_heat_up.title: Do I need to heat them up?
toppers_heat_up.answer: Nope. Just pop, pour, and watch your dog’s eyes light up.

toppers_nasties.title: Are there any nasties inside?
toppers_nasties.answer: Zero. No artificial colours, flavours, or fillers — just honest ingredients.

toppers_open.title: What happens after I open it?
toppers_open.answer: Fridge it, finish it within 2 days, and enjoy the happy tail wags in between.

toppers_shipping.title: How do we Ship?
toppers_shipping.answer: Standard shipping takes 2/3 working days and is free on orders over $300. Or, if you've got a hungry pup, we can do same day delivery

footer.text: Want to know more? Head over to our full

ingredients_toppers.title: A Fresh addition to your dogs mealtime
ingredients_toppers.subtext: Our toppers are steam cooked to keep them both delicious and packed full of nutrients.

ingredients_kibbles.title: A healthy dog is a happy dog
ingredients_kibbles.subtext: That's why we have used a perfect blend of proteins and nutrients to ensure dogs of all shapes, sizes and breeds are happy and full of energy.

ingredients_treats.title: Ingredients you can actually understand!
ingredients_treats.subtext: Our treats are filled with a handful of nutritious ingredients and absolutely no nonsense.

vet_backed.title: Vet Recommended
vet_backed.text_1_full: Dr. Tiffany Harries work alongside our U.S. based nutritionist to make sure Buddy Bites has all the nutrients and essential protein to let your dog thrive!
vet_backed.text_1_part_2: to make sure Buddy Bites has all the nutrients and essential protein to let your dog thrive!
vet_backed.text_2: With has over 10 years of experience, Dr. Harris worked in SA for 4 years before moving to Hong Kong, where she has worked for 7 years. She is registered on the Hong Kong Veterinary Surgeons Board.
